name: Advanced Auto Filter
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: ඔයාගෙ App ID එක :: From my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: ඔයාගෙ API Hash එක :: From my.telegram.org

DB_URI.description: ඔයාගෙ Mongo DB URL එක :: From mongodb.com

USER_SESSION.description: ඔයා ගත්ත Pyrogram User Session String එක :: From https://repl.it/@prgofficial/String-Gen

BOT_NAME.description: ඔයාගෙ botගෙ නම (Default :: Advanced Auto Filter)

GROUP_USERNAME.description: ඔයාගෙ Group Username එක '@' නැතුව (Default :: Group)

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: ඔයාගෙ User name එක '@' නැතුව (Default :: Admin)
